entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low plus 2.
